pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyze Time Series // Main function of package is helped to analyze time series, peculiar is fuzzy time series. The package can calculate AIC value of common time series models and propose the best models according AIC values. To fuzzy time series by "Chen", "Sing", "Heuristic" and "Chen-Hsu" models, also can fuzzy and forecast time series by Abbasov-Mamedova model.
